snippet: TISHMAN--John. The governors, members and staff of The Real Estate Board of New York mourn the passing of John Tishman, legendary builder and a distinguished and prominent philanthropist who devoted his life to making his hometown New York City a better place to live and work. A pioneer and leader of the construction management industry, John supervised the building of many world class projects including the construction of three of the four earliest 100 plus story skyscrapers: the original World Trade Center and the John Hancock Center in Chicago, IL. We express our heartfelt condolences to his son, REBNY Governor and Executive Committee member Daniel Tishman, his daughter Katherine Blacklock and the entire Tishman family. Rob Speyer, Chairman John Banks, President 1/3
lead_paragraph: TISHMAN--John. The governors, members and staff of The Real Estate Board of New York mourn the passing of John Tishman, legendary builder and a distinguished and prominent philanthropist who devoted his life to making his hometown New York City a better place to live and work. A pioneer and leader of the construction management industry, John supervised the building of many world class projects including the construction of three of the four earliest 100 plus story skyscrapers: the original World Trade Center and the John Hancock Center in Chicago, IL. We express our heartfelt condolences to his son, REBNY Governor and Executive Committee member Daniel Tishman, his daughter Katherine Blacklock and the entire Tishman family. Rob Speyer, Chairman John Banks, President 1/3
